title: Santa Fe Plaza 25 de Mayo
description: Historic plaza in the heart of downtown Santa Fe.

title: Santa Fe Suspension Bridge
description: Historic suspension bridge of the city of Santa Fe

title: The Molino Cultural Factory
description: Former flour mill with interactive art, culture, and science exhibits and activities.

title: The Santa Fe Shopping Mall
description: This shopping center is located in a central area, on Dock 1 of the Port of Santa Fe, and is characterized by offering exclusive stores from major brands.

title: Brigadier General Estanislao López Stadium
description: The Brigadier General Estanislao López Stadium, also known as El Cementerio de los Elefantes, is the home stadium of Club Atlético Colón in Santa Fe, Argentina.

title: Monument to the Argentine Flag
alt: The Monumento Histórico Nacional a la Bandera, located in Rosario, Argentina, is a large monument dedicated to the Argentine flag.

title: Rosario Plaza Independencia
description: Independence Park is a large green space in the heart of Rosario, Argentina. It's known for its lake, where you can take boat rides, and for its green areas, ideal for walking and enjoying the outdoors.

title: Universidad del Litoral
description: The Universidad Nacional del Litoral is one of the most important public universities in the Argentine Republic.
